articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The feather, from now extinct New Zealand huia bird, broke the previous record by more than four times.
articles.title: World's most expensive feather sold in New Zealand auction

articles.description: Ms Haley was once Mr Trump's UN ambassador and was the last of his major Republican primary rivals.
articles.title: Nikki Haley says she is voting Trump for president

articles.description: An election has been called by Rishi Sunak sooner than many commentators and politicians had expected.
articles.title: Chris Mason: Why did Sunak decide to call summer election?

articles.description: The PM calls an early summer poll in a rain-soaked speech outside 10 Downing Street.
articles.title: Rishi Sunak announces UK general election for Thursday 4 July

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Prosecutors allege a “scramble" to ensure boxes containing sensitive material were moved “off-camera" at Mar-a-Lago.
articles.title: Classified files found in Trump bedroom at Mar-a-Lago

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Declarations by Ireland, Spain and Norway will put pressure on other countries in Europe.
articles.title: The impact of recognising a Palestinian state

articles.description: New harrowing footage shows the moment Naama Levy and other women were seized by Hamas gunmen.
articles.title: Israeli hostage's family hopes video is reminder of need for deal

articles.description: Finland and the Baltic states react to a Russian proposal to redraw sea borders dating back 40 years.
articles.title: Baltic warning over Russian plan to move sea borders

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: One passenger said he heard a woman "screaming in agony" and saw another with a "gash on her head".
articles.title: Singapore Airlines: Passengers recall horror onboard flight

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A former Royal Marine charged with assisting the Hong Kong intelligence service has been found dead.
articles.title: Matthew Trickett: Man charged with spying for Hong Kong has died
